m_szDocTitle: GM testing Apple Watch app to open car doors
m_szDocSumamry: GM testing Apple Watch app to open car doors John D Stoll Print Unlock your car with your Apple Watch. Source: General Motors Ever lock your keys in the car? General Motors says it’s going to have an app for that. Vice President of Strategy Mike Ableson, speaking during an analyst presentation at the company’s suburban-Detroit proving grounds, showed images of an Apple Watch app under testing that lets owners lock or unlock their cars, or start them remotely.
